deployCode(bytes).details: deploys code and emits an event with the pointer and code hash

deployCodeSplit(bytes).details: deploys code and emits an event with the pointer and code hash

returns.pointer1_: pointer to the first part of the deployed code
returns.pointer2_: pointer to the second part of the deployed code

userdoc.notice: This contract is open and can be called by any address. It provides functionality to deploy and read code using SSTORE2.
